sentences: Talo on hyvin suuri ja kaunis.
context: The word 'suuri' is an adjective that means big, large or great in Finnish. It declines depending on the case and number of the noun it modifies. As shown in the declension table, there are different forms for singular and plural nouns, as well as various cases like nominative, genitive, partitive etc. The word can also be used to describe abstract concepts such as importance ('suuri merkitys' - great significance).
